episodes.title: First Episode - Introduction
episodes.description: Welcome to our first episode where we introduce the concept of the Failure podcast and why we're focusing on entrepreneurial failures.

episodes.title: Episode 2 - Coming Soon
episodes.description: Stay tuned for our next episode where we'll dive deeper into entrepreneurial challenges and recovery strategies.

podcast.name: Failure
podcast.description: A podcast about entrepreneurship with a focus on people that failed and came back from these failures.
